Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* AlarmCallBackPtr)(uint32_t CbArg)

Type of Call back function for Alarm Event. A uint32_t argument can be optionally used.

Definition at line 172 of file RTC001.h.

typedef enum RTC001_ErrorType RTC001_ErrorType

This enumeration defines RTC001 App error and status values.

typedef enum RTC001_FlagType RTC001_FlagType

The below set of flags are used to indicate RTC module's Alarm and Periodic Timer event status. They can be used while clearing the status as well.

typedef struct RTC001_HandleType RTC001_HandleType

RTC001 App Handle structure. Stores a few parameters configured in App UI.

typedef struct RTC001_TimeHandle RTC001_TimeHandle

Structure for RTC Time configuration.

typedef void(* RTC001_TimerCallBackPtr)(void *)

Type of Call back function for Periodic Timer Event. A (void *) argument can be optionally used.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum RTC001_ErrorType

This enumeration defines RTC001 App error and status values.

Enumerator:
RTC001_INVALID_HANDLE 

Invalid handle or parameter

RTC001_ERROR 

Undefined Error

RTC001_SET 

Flag is set

RTC001_RESET 

Flag is reset

Definition at line 78 of file RTC001.h.

enum RTC001_FlagType

The below set of flags are used to indicate RTC module's Alarm and Periodic Timer event status. They can be used while clearing the status as well.

Enumerator:
SECONDS_FLAG 

The Seconds flag in RTC

MINUTES_FLAG 

The Minutes flag in RTC

HOURS_FLAG 

The Hours flag in RTC

DAYS_FLAG 

The Days flag in RTC

MONTHS_FLAG 

The Months flag in RTC

YEARS_FLAG 

The Years flag in RTC

ALARM_FLAG 

The Alarm flag in RTC

Definition at line 149 of file RTC001.h.

Function Documentation

void RTC001_Init ( void  )

Initialization function for the App. This function configures the RTC module registers as per options given in App UI and enables the RTC module.

Returns:
void

Reentrant: NO

Example: 

  #include <DAVE3.h>
  int main(void)
  {
    // Initialize Apps
    DAVE_Init(); // RTC001_Init() will be called within DAVE_Init()
    // ... infinite loop ...
    while(1)
    {}
  }
